title: Script 'L'
content:
I need to recreate this logo. I'm wondering if the letter "L" could be a typeface? Anyone recognize?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142525im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25341.gif)
author: jsandvik

comments.content: Looks like it could be part of a Z. The two strokes may not even be part of the same character, or may have been moved apart or something.

Phew, I finally got the logo in vector format - you can now stop scratching your heads! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142525im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
(I still don't have a clue if it's a custom job or letter "L" from a typeface)
